context.description:
Play on itch.io

### Chao Bing: A Read-Only Memory Experience is an interactive memoir in the style of a 90s CD-ROM storybook game. The game features narrated storybook scenes and mini-games based on moments from my childhood to tell a larger story about time, memory, and transformation. Chao Bing is a game––and also about the performative and poetic act of making a game. Chao Bing takes place as a web-based game on itch.io, and also has been presented in an exhibition format and a live-performance. I'm looking to share this work in more settings and formats–via gallery installations, game fairs, writing and publication, artist talks, or live-performance readings and more. If this interests you, please reach out! ## Gameplay ![Chao bing preview 5](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/pQr3vZFpCGPThoyunTCj9/0627f38c63b542c0f308e39a01a88e22/captures_chrome-capture-2023-6-18.png) ![Chao Bing preview 1](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/2KTVWg8NW8c0eiBg3tmH9i/743f7e73ad684b36515f62dac1259b72/captures_chrome-capture-2023-5-15__2_-min.png) ![Chao Bing Preview 4](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/3JZhIdWR5tLQxZIvdPP4pr/f0cfde8ae5eaf8a0122dad96f48bb4ee/captures_chrome-capture-2023-5-15__7_-min.png) ![Chao Bing Preview 2](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/3MztZgejSZdE7h29xgW3Nu/15c7e4cfebe98a7a1aeae43d8ea86406/captures_chrome-capture-2023-5-15__6_-min.png) ![Chao bing preview 6](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/33TlKpJQFnIFT0lEH3bdnm/2e1da211ba95af478a59c3bdfa18a858/captures_chrome-capture-2023-6-18__1_.png) ![Chao Bing Preview 3](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/5ZQ4AlwS69MiDuP7gAfH2Z/8846ca80888d90e3dedf604fa37ad77b/captures_chrome-capture-2023-5-15__5_-min.png) ![Chao bing preview 7](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/3LX4Hf8xLcbOrPXlWurScI/d8c4ec31ca7f22954d00d2d755cae0a4/captures_chrome-capture-2023-6-18__3_.png) ### Credits __Design, art, programming:__ Jackie Liu __Soundtrack:__ Don Hanson ## Exhibition I exhibited Chao Bing as part of the Art & Code [group exhibition](https://rhizome.org/events/art-and-code-demo-day-2023/) at Dunkunsthalle (an art gallery out of a former Dunkin Donuts) during NEW INC's DEMO2023 Festival. To adapt the game to be suitable for exhibition, I displayed a playable demo of the game in a Raspberry Pi computer in kiosk mode and connected it to an early 2000s monitor--all within my "childhood bedroom". ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 1](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/34Wyt3idh1yAnr7GmMw6VU/0b0b0ec67c1cd2db76bf88aa09344483/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_42.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 2](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/hqrMsDFBkcU5xj6Che5fq/039fbcf67399872f08fd35adee8a5a24/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_40.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 3](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/1kBp2DZAra4dL3A5fb3JOa/7c0412621a2a9390a96307e3ba90a060/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_47.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 4](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/gGYhBBCuIL2cbTRwDaYb1/b088d53262e444957909088bb4276dff/Art_Code_Opening_14.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 5](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/rlu4be69QbX8swQaD7VQm/b0531647484cd203a018f5557a4c3a06/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_45.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 6](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/1lKGxxnCGQcNEje4mfa7wJ/f510aa1d894681ef51a0c5f7e9497572/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_43.JPG) ![Dunkunsthalle Exhibition 7](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/6Z0c4EhUcntKjVNEqgpPrQ/1f9b56cc007e540b473fe4f0857e3504/Dunkunsthalle_Installs_46.JPG) Photography by Isaiah Winters ## Performance In December 2023, I adapted the story of Chao Bing into a live-performance during my 1-week residency at [CultureHub](https://www.culturehub.org/). You can learn more and view the recording on CultureHub's [project page](https://www.culturehub.org/chao-bing-a-reading-writing) for the event. ![Chao Bing performance 1](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/7lzD8DVFJflQabLjEcDG95/2b9620de64bf20012ef9e05e0e5127ef/20231215-191529.jpg) ![Chao Bing performance 2](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/2MGvhykeh7ZgzDOP8V6X4I/7ffbe8cdd8faadd405d4e84da5e594d3/20231215-192727.jpg) ![Chao Bing performance 3](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/5KWJ5IfJkavX8jUF2gceSB/5bd816c45f1fa55b118fba707c817938/20231215-194006.jpg) Photography by Eric Leong ## Acknowledgements I'm so thankful for the friends and mentors who have seen me through making this piece and/or given me critical feedback and support. Special thanks to NEW INC for supporting this project and the team at CultureHub for giving me the space to develop it further.
context.shortDescription: An interactive memoir about read-only memories, transformation, and making a game.
context.title: Chao Bing: A Read-Only Memory Experience
